```{r library, include=F}
#Preamble
library(tidyverse)
library(report.generation)

LOADED_HOSP_STATE_TOTALS <- FALSE
LOADED_INF_CTY_PEAKS <- FALSE
LOADED_HOSP_CTY_PEAKS <- FALSE

shp <- load_shapefile(region_code = params$region_code,
                      state_fips = params$state_fips,
                      shapefile_fn = params$shapefile_fn)
ctynames <- load_county_pops(region_code = params$region_code,
                             state_fips = params$state_fips,
                             pop_year = params$pop_year)
```

## State Level Results

```{r plot-hosp-state-sample}
plot_ts_hosp_state_sample(hosp_state_totals,
                          pdeath_level = "high",
                          scenario_labels = params$scenario_labels,
                          scenario_cols = params$scenario_cols,
                          sim_start_date = "2020-01-31",
                          sim_end_date = "2020-09-30",
                          plot_intervention = TRUE,
                          interv_start_date = "2020-03-19",
                          interv_end_date = "2020-05-14")
```

```{r plot-ts-inc-state}
plot_ts_incid_inf_state_sample(hosp_state_totals,
                               scenario_labels = params$scenario_labels,
                               scenario_cols = params$scenario_cols,
                               sim_start_date = "2020-01-31",
                               sim_end_date = "2020-09-30",
                               plot_intervention = TRUE,
                               interv_start_date = "2020-03-19",
                               interv_end_date = "2020-05-14")
```

```{r plot-ts-death}
plot_ts_incid_death_state_sample_allPdeath(hosp_state_totals,
                                           scenario_labels = params$scenario_labels,
                                           scenario_cols = params$scenario_cols,
                                           pdeath_filecode = params$pdeath_filecode,
                                           pdeath_labels = params$pdeath_labels,
```
